data.text:
Rental unit in Ljubljana

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 128 reviews4.98 (128)

Spacious Castle View Apartment In Historic Centre

This immaculate and spacious apartment will be your oasis in the heart of the city, walking distance to the Triple Bridge, the Preseren Square with magnificent Church and the Central Market, overlooking one of the most beautiful romantic streets as well as the historic Ljubljana castle. Comfortable queen (160cm) bed and attached bathroom with a shower and a tub. A smart 40" TV, fully equipped kitchen refrigerator, as well as seating area. Linens, towels, toiletries, washer & dryer are provided.

Cottage in Podkum

5 out of 5 average rating, 112 reviews5 (112)

Gingerbread House -cosy cottage in the countryside

If you want to take a step back in time and get away from our busy everyday‚Äôs this cottage is the perfect place for you. It is ideal for enjoying and exploring the beautiful side of nature before spending relaxing evenings by the fire. Take time to relax - read, write, draw, think or just live and enjoy the company or be active - hike, bicycling.. The cottage really suits people who love the country cottage feeling and relaxed atmosphere or as a base for one day trips across Slovenija.

Rental unit in Ljubljana

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 468 reviews4.98 (468)

CASTLE HILL'S studioApartment - Green Retreat

Light & bright, spacious for 2 and cosy for 4. Only 5 minutes from the Central market place, up into the greenery of the Castle Hill. Planning on visiting the Castle? You're already halfway there. Hidden, quite and remote, just like in the country, but when stroll down the hill, cross the street, and you're at frenzy pedestrian zone. The place is newly furnished and practical. Parking & BBQ outside, comfy bed inside, and it's "a no tuck in" on the Castle Hill. Welcome to my jungle.

Cabin in Zgornje Jezersko

4.86 out of 5 average rating, 177 reviews4.86 (177)

Idyllic cottage in the beautiful Alps - We R open!

Cabin lies in the heart of alpine valley village Zgornje Jezersko. Surrounded by the mountain peaks reaching over 2500 meters. It is quiet and warm retreat for those who wants to find some peace of mind in nature, fresh air, good hikes and some of the most amazing views right from their bedroom. The cabin is also equipped with stable hi-speed fibre optic internet and a strong wifi. Welcome to a tiny alpine paradise! *We support Ukraine‚Äôs üá∫üá¶ defence against the invaders*

Rental unit in Robanov Kot

4.91 out of 5 average rating, 140 reviews4.91 (140)

Bela I, Robanov kot

Apartma Bela is situated in the heart of Robanov kot ‚Äì the most well preserved glacial valley in Solƒçava region, located 15 min drive from Logar valley. Calm and cosy suite offers the perfect starting point for hiking, mountaineering or cycling. The apartment is located on the ground floor. The house consists of four separate apartments, with near identical square footage. Everything listed is private, there are no shared spaces. More on our ig page @apartmabela

Condo in Ljubljana

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 132 reviews4.99 (132)

Riverside apartment with free parking

Recently renovated two bedroom apartment with free garage parking in the heart of Ljubljana's pedestrian zone is overlooking Ljubljanica river and Ljubljana Castle. After a good night rest, in a comfy king bed, you can start exploring the old town's landmarks, cafes and restaurants or enjoy a self-prepared breakfast in our fully equipped kitchen. We are in a pedestrian area but if you arrive by car we offer you free parking in a residential garage for one car.

Rental unit in Ljubljana

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 108 reviews4.98 (108)

Wood art Tivoli studio

The flat is is located in the central park of Ljubljana, on the verge of the woods, where you are likely to come across deer and hares. The environment has an artistic atmosphere: the Graphic Centre with its nice coffee shop, and ≈†vicarija with studios of a number of Slovenian artist and a bistro, are in close vicinity In summer time, there are artistic events, concerts and performans. It is a 15-minute walk to the old part of the city, mostly through the park.

Farm stay in Mislinja

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 112 reviews4.98 (112)

Apartment * In Adam * Ecological Farm Adam *

The apartment is located in a separate building in the yard of a secluded farm in the unspoiled nature of Pohorje. From the village of Mislinja, you ascend slightly to the homestead along a 1 km private macadam road. In the surrounding area you can walk through the mighty Pohorje forests and plains, cycle along countless forest roads and paths, climb in the nearby granite climbing area, explore the karst caves Hude luknje or relax in the local natural pool.

Rental unit in Ljubljana

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 658 reviews4.97 (658)

Spacious Central apartment, Terrace, Free parking

Spacious apartment with a large terrace and free private parking, 8 minute walk to the main city square. Peaceful location right next to an archeological park. Good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and groups of friends. No parties or excessive loudness. The parking spot is located right next to the apartment, behind a private barrier for which you will receive a remote for the duration of your stay.

Loft in Ljubljana

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 139 reviews4.99 (139)

ü•á Unique studio ‚Ä¢ historical center ‚Ä¢ high ceiling

This cozy loft, part of the Old Quarter Residence, is made to ensure a comfortable stay, featuring a kitchenette, a spacious bed, high-speed internet, a living room with a sofa, a TV with Netflix and a window nook. Located on a pedestrian-only street known for cafes, restaurants and artisan shops, within a 2min walk to the vibrant promenade by the Ljubljanica river with the Triple Bridge.

Tiny home in Velike La≈°ƒçe

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 130 reviews4.92 (130)

Cheerful little house with Hona Lux 1 jacuzzi

Enjoy the sounds of nature while staying in this unique place. Enjoy a hot tub. In a quiet location with views of nearby peaks and pristine woods. Ideal for getting away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. There is additional fee for cleaning! For last minute reservations - please contact us if the jacuzzi is ready for use (it needs some time to warm up!!!).
